channel.title: How do I Jar a DeltaScape 317? (Connection Error When Loading Jar)
channel.description:
My client runs perfectly when I launch the server.bat and I can play the game nicely. Except when I jar it and run, it attempts to load but says connection error [u]"[b]after[/b] the "requesting title screen"[/u] and [u][b]before[/b] the login page[/u]
During the process which is done below. The below image is not my actual problem, but during this screen after "requesting title screen" and BEFORE the login page is when it says "Connection Error"
[img]http://t2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSidxi8Eg7TItbQ2Y4u43W1ophOtYBcobOIa3smkLQjuWsMau1OH7NVZz8z[/img]

item.title: How do I Jar a DeltaScape 317? (Connection Error When Loading Jar)
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

Broken-Reality:

I’ve seen servers like delta jarred, but i aint slept in over 20HRS, and at the back of my mind there is something telling me that a friend told me its not jar-able -.-

it is you might have to rig cache onto drop box a unique way but the client is what was stolen from jagex (mainly cache.) and jagex always had it jarred via webclient… its just finding where to place the .class path and what file the main .class is

Read full topic
item.source: How do I Jar a DeltaScape 317? (Connection Error When Loading Jar)

item.title: How do I Jar a DeltaScape 317? (Connection Error When Loading Jar)
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

Broken-Reality:

I’m pretty sure you can’t jar delta Never done myself, just what i think i’ve heard :s

verry posible

main class might be egui or gui.java not client.java…

try those two tell how you make out
